full_title: This Sunday by Future & Metro Boomin
title: This Sunday

description.plain:
This track was allegedly recorded on February 23, 2015 and leaked online on January 18, 2022. A line from the chorus was likely a reference point for frequent collaborator Drake when he made “Feel No Ways” which dropped in 2016. Though the instrumental, tempo, and verses bare no similarity, the flow of the chorus is similar. This follows as Future is officially credited as a co-writer on “Feel No Ways,” likely for the contribution of this line in the chorus.

The instrumental for this also bares similarities to “Hallucinating,” a track Future released later in 2017.
